```{r read data}
dadoscancro<- read.csv(file = "data/CancerMortalityEU.csv")
names(dadoscancro)
View(dadoscancro)

dadospopulacao <- read.csv( file = "data/PopulationEU.csv")
names(dadospopulacao)
str(dadospopulacao)

```

```{r tidyverse}
# install.packages("data.table")
# library(data.table)
# library(rmarkdown)
# library(ggplot2)
# library(tidyverse)
# library(tidyr)
# library(dplyr)
# library(here))
# library(magrittr)
# library(ggrepel)
# library(knitr)
# library(kableExtra)

tail(dadoscancro, n=10)
head(dadospopulacao, n=10)

#Temos NAS

novopop<-dadospopulacao[,-c(3,5)]
names(novopop)





POP <- melt(novopop,
           id.vars = c("Country", "Sex", "ageGroup"),
           measure = patterns("^[X]"),
           variable.name = "YearC",
           value.name = c("numeropop"),
           na.rm = TRUE)
str(POP)
View(POP)


# Create a Numberic Year column
POP[, Year := as.numeric(gsub("^[X]", "", YearC))][, YearC:=NULL]
# Order data by country and year
setcolorder(POP, c("Country", "Sex", "ageGroup", "Year", "numeropop"))
str(POP)



```

```{r cancros}

#Cancros

names(dadoscancro)

novocancro<- dadoscancro[,-c(2,4,6)]
names(novocancro)

CANCRO <- melt(novocancro,
           id.vars = c("Country", "CancerSite", "ageGroup"),
           measure = patterns("^[Males]"),
           variable.name = "YearC",
           value.name = c("numerofem"),
           na.rm = TRUE)

```
